summary: Changes the damage that enemies deal to the player to 1.0 on all difficulties.
descriptionHtml:
Changes the damage that enemies deal to the player to 1.0 on all difficulties. Damage that the player deals to enemies remains unchanged.

Vanilla:
Difficulty, Damage Dealt, Damage Taken
Novice x2 x0.5
Apprentice x1.5 x0.75
Adept x1 x1
Expert x0.75 x1.5
Master x0.5 x2
Legendary x0.25 x3

Modded:
Difficulty, Damage Dealt, Damage Taken
Novice x2 x1
Apprentice x1.5 x1
Adept x1 x1
Expert x0.75 x1
Master x0.5 x1
Legendary x0.25 x1

This mod was created for a user of Skyrim Redone. They did not like killing enemies in a few hits and so they bumped the difficulty up to Legendary. They also did not like the fact that enemies could kill them in a few hits if they bumped the difficulty up to Legendary and so I created this mod for them.
author: Kozoi
